column5: Available to UK residents onlyThis programme is for experienced practitioners, such as nurses, pharmacists, radiographers, audiologists, cardiac physiologists, ambulance staff and midwives, who have clinical practice access with patient management responsibilities.It’s designed to support the development of experienced, registered health and care practitioners to a level of practice characterised by a high degree of autonomy and complex decision making. This master’s level award encompasses the four pillars of clinical practice:
